promptTemplates.twoPara: Write me a scenario for D&D 5th Edition for medium level characters that is &*(generalAdjective)*& and has a(n) &*(generalAdjective)*& &*(endFeature)*&! Only 2 paragraphs please.
promptTemplates.encounterGenerator: I need help creating my D&D encounter for my session. In 200 words or less, can you help create an encounter where the party walks into a potential fight? Also, make sure the encounter is a(n) &*(encounterDifficulty)*& encounter which includes a(n) &*(monster)*& with a challenge rating of &*(challengeRating)*&. The party is comprised of &*(numOfPlayers)*& level &*(playerLevel)*& character(s):. Be as descriptive as possible. Don't narrate or control the player character actions!
